Configs.Description: These settings are typically always applied.  Note "Duty Cycle Neutral Deadband" and "Neutral Mode" are not used during Torque-Current control as this is a unique control method.
Configs.Name: Motor Output

Configs.Description: These current limits are applied in Duty-Cycle and Voltage based control modes.
Configs.Name: Current Limits

Configs.Description: Slot 0 Closed Loop Constants.  The units depend on the requested closed-loop mode.
Configs.Name: Slot 0

Configs.Description: Slot 1 Closed Loop Constants.  The units depend on the requested closed-loop mode.
Configs.Name: Slot 1

Configs.Description: Slot 2 Closed Loop Constants.  The units depend on the requested closed-loop mode.
Configs.Name: Slot 2

Configs.Description: These settings are applied during Voltage-based control modes.
Configs.Name: Voltage

Configs.Description: These setttings are applied during Torque-based control modes.
Configs.Name: Torque Current

Configs.Description: Configures the sensor used for closed-loop and limit features.  If using a remote sensor, be sure to configure sensor source and sensor ID.
Configs.Name: Feedback

Configs.Description: Configures the sensors used for differential control.  All differential control requires a remote Talon FX sensor ID.  If using a Pigeon 2 or CANcoder, be sure to also configure its remote sensor ID.
Configs.Name: Differential Sensors

Configs.Description: Configures the constants used for differential control, such as the differential peak outputs.
Configs.Name: Differential Constants

Configs.Description: These ramps are applied during open-loop operation. Torque settings are applied during torque-based control modes.  Duty Cycle settings are applied during non-torque-based modes.
Configs.Name: Open Loop Ramps

Configs.Description: These ramps are applied during closed-loop operation. Torque settings are applied during torque-based control modes.  Duty Cycle settings are applied during non-torque-based modes.
Configs.Name: Closed Loop Ramps

Configs.Description: Configs that affect general behavior during closed-looping.
Configs.Name: Closed Loop General

Configs.Description: These allow for automatic disabling of motor output when limit switch is asserted.
Configs.Name: Hardware Limit Switch

Configs.Description: These allow for automatic disabling of motor ouput when position is out of range.
Configs.Name: Software Limit Switch

Configs.Description: These are used during Motion Magic closed loop operation.
Configs.Name: Motion Magic

Configs.Description: These are general values for custom applications.  Example use may be calibrating your mechanism.
Configs.Name: Custom Params
